episodes.title: Episode 1: The Future of Women's Golf
episodes.description: In our debut episode, we discuss the exciting developments in women's professional golf and what the future holds for the LPGA Tour.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Major Championship Preview
episodes.description: A comprehensive preview of the upcoming major championships and predictions for the season's biggest events.

episodes.title: Episode 3: Rising Stars Spotlight
episodes.description: We shine the spotlight on the next generation of LPGA stars and discuss their impact on the future of women's golf.
